name: Bool
desc: A value type whose instances are either true or false.

items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are equal.
Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are not equal.
Performs a logical NOT operation on a Boolean value.

items.name: random<T>
items.desc: Returns a random Boolean value, using the given generator as a source for randomness.

items.name: description
items.desc: A textual representation of the Boolean value.

items.name: customMirror
items.desc: A mirror that reflects the Bool instance.

items.name: customPlaygroundQuickLook
items.desc: A custom playground Quick Look for the Bool instance.

items.name: hash
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of this value by feeding them into the given hasher.

items.name: encode
items.desc: Encodes this value into the given encoder.

items.name: dataValue
items.desc: The Boolean wrapped in a data value.

items.name: dataValueType
items.desc: The underlying type a Boolean uses when it wraps itself in a data value.
